name: Gold Bar

name: Iron Bar
DSC: Common material, grey color, good for commonly used weapons and armor

name: Thorium Bar
DSC: Rare material, pale bluish color, good for heavy weapons

name: Adamantide Ore
DSC: Rare raw material, blue color, can be smelted into bars

name: Copper Ore
DSC: Common raw material, orange color, can be smelted into bars, usually it can be found near hills and river banks

name: Dark Iron Ore
DSC: Can be smelted into bars, dark grey/black color, usually found in deeper queries

name: Eternium Ore
DSC: Precious raw material, purple color, usually found in Nether regions

name: Fel Iron Ore
DSC: Rare raw material, green color, can be smelted into bars, emits with foul Fel energy

name: Gold Ore
DSC: Half-rare material, yellow color, generally precious to find, can be cast into items, usually coins

name: Iron Ore
DSC: Common raw material, grey color, generally good to find, when combined with copper it can be casted into bronze or tin bars

name: Thorium Ore
DSC: Rare raw material, pale bluish color, can be smelted into bars, got the name form the mighty Norse God Thor

name: Azure
DSC: Rare crystal, bluish gem, commonly used in jewelcrafting, adds mana

name: Dawnstone
DSC: Rare crystal, yellow gem, commonly used in jewelcrafting, adds agilaty

name: Emerald
DSC: Rare crystal, green gem, commonly used in jewelcrafting and ornaments

name: Nightseye
DSC: Rare crystal, dark-purple gem, commonly used in jewelcrafting, emits shadowy glow, rumor has it that at night shadowy figures emerge looking for it!

name: Ruby
DSC: Rare crystal, red gem, commonly used in jewelcrafting and ornaments

name: Talasite
DSC: Rare crystal, neon-bluish gem, commonly used in jewelcrafting, adds mana

name: Dragons Heart
spec: Rare Crystal, Firey color, Commonly found in Dragon lairs , Adds fame if found
DSC: Rare crystal, firey color, commonly found in Dragon lairs, it is believed that it's crystalized live dragon-fire, adds fame if found

name: Common Beer
DSC: Common beverage, mild taste, commonly found in any local tavern

name: Dragon's Breath
DSC: Rare beverage, firey taste, commonly found among dwarf tavern, keeps you warm at icy winters, Drink from stone mugs!

name: Fish Beer
DSC: Rare beverage, slimey taste, smells awful, commonly sold among Murlocs, 'Nk mllgggrrrr!' (Not thirsty in Nerglish)

name: Iron Hammer
DSC: Common crafting tool, made of iron, commonly found in any local blacksmithing shop

name: Infused Hammer
DSC: Rare crafting tool, made of iron, infused with magic, commonly found aming dwarven blacksmiths

name: Treasure Map
DSC: Common item among adventurers, leads to treasure, commonly found in any local Adventurer's Guild, 'Did someone say treasure?' For Khaz-modan!

name: Pickaxe
DSC: Common gathering tool, made of iron, used for collecting ores, commonly found in any local blacksmithing shop
